Protocols/GraphVertexPropertyMap.html.name: GraphVertexPropertyMap
Protocols/GraphVertexPropertyMap.html.abstract: Maps a VertexId from a Graph to a property of type Value associated with that VertexId.

Protocols/GraphEdgePropertyMap.html.name: GraphEdgePropertyMap
Protocols/GraphEdgePropertyMap.html.abstract: Maps an EdgeId from a Graph to a property of type Value associated with that EdgeId.

Structs/DictionaryEdgePropertyMap.html.name: DictionaryEdgePropertyMap
Structs/DictionaryEdgePropertyMap.html.abstract: An external property map backed by a dictionary.

Structs/InternalVertexPropertyMap.html.name: InternalVertexPropertyMap
Structs/InternalVertexPropertyMap.html.abstract: Defines a GraphVertexPropertyMap exposing properties stored in the vertex type of the graph.

Structs/InternalEdgePropertyMap.html.name: InternalEdgePropertyMap
Structs/InternalEdgePropertyMap.html.abstract: Defines a GraphEdgePropertyMap exposing properties stored in the edge type of the graph.

Protocols/ReachableVertex.html#/s:13Peng.name: isReachable
Protocols/ReachableVertex.html#/s:13Peng.abstract: True if self is reachable from the starting point.

Protocols/DistanceVertex.html#/s:13Pengu.name: VertexId

Protocols/DistanceEdge.html#/s:13Penguin.name: distance

Structs/ParallelGraphAlgorithmContext.ht.abstract: The identifier of the vertex this function execution is operating upon.

Structs/ParallelGraphAlgorithmContext.ht.name: globalState
Structs/ParallelGraphAlgorithmContext.ht.abstract: The global state provided to each vertex.

Structs/ParallelGraphAlgorithmContext.ht.name: inbox
Structs/ParallelGraphAlgorithmContext.ht.abstract: The merged message resulting from merging all the messages sent in the last parallel step.

Structs/ParallelGraphAlgorithmContext.ht.name: send(_:to:)
Structs/ParallelGraphAlgorithmContext.ht.abstract: Sends message to vertex, which will be received at the next step.

Structs/ParallelGraphAlgorithmContext.ht.name: outDegree
Structs/ParallelGraphAlgorithmContext.ht.abstract: The number of edges that source from the current vertex.

Structs/ParallelGraphAlgorithmContext.ht.name: edges
Structs/ParallelGraphAlgorithmContext.ht.abstract: The edges that source from the current vertex.

Structs/SequentialMailboxes.html#/s:13Pe.name: deliver()
Structs/SequentialMailboxes.html#/s:13Pe.abstract: Transfers messages that were previously sent into the inboxes of the verticies.

Classes/PerThreadMailboxes.html#/s:13Pen.name: deliver()
Classes/PerThreadMailboxes.html#/s:13Pen.abstract: Transfers messages that were previously sent into the inboxes of the verticies.

Protocols/MailboxesProtocol.html#/s:13Pe.abstract: The per-vertex representation of this communication abstraction.

Protocols/MailboxesProtocol.html#/s:13Pe.abstract: Transfers messages that were previously sent into the inboxes of the verticies; returns true

Protocols/ParallelGraph.html.name: ParallelGraph

Protocols/MailboxProtocol.html.name: MailboxProtocol

Structs/TablePredecessorVisitor.html#/s:.name: edgeRelaxed(_:_:)

Structs/VisitorChain.html#/s:13PenguinGr.name: init(_:_:)

Structs/VisitorChain.html#/s:13PenguinGr.abstract: Called when vertex is at the front of the queue and is examined.

Structs/VisitorChain.html#/s:13PenguinGr.name: examine(edge:_:)
Structs/VisitorChain.html#/s:13PenguinGr.abstract: Called for each edge associated with a freshly discovered vertex.

Structs/VisitorChain.html#/s:13PenguinGr.name: finish(vertex:_:)
Structs/VisitorChain.html#/s:13PenguinGr.abstract: Called once for each vertex right after it is colored black.

Structs/VisitorChain.html#/s:13PenguinGr.abstract: start(vertex:_:) is called once for each start vertex.

Structs/VisitorChain.html#/s:13PenguinGr.abstract: Called for each back edge in the search tree.

Structs/VisitorChain.html#/s:13PenguinGr.abstract: Called for edges that are forward or cross edges in the search tree.

Structs/VisitorChain.html#/s:13PenguinGr.abstract: Called for each edge with a gray destination

Structs/VisitorChain.html#/s:13PenguinGr.name: blackDestination(_:_:)
Structs/VisitorChain.html#/s:13PenguinGr.abstract: Called for each edge with a black destination.

Structs/VisitorChain.html#/s:13PenguinGr.abstract: Called for each edge that results in a shorter path to its destination vertex.

Structs/VisitorChain.html#/s:13PenguinGr.abstract: Called for each edge that does not result in a shorter path to its destination vertex.

Protocols/DijkstraVisitor.html#/s:13Peng.abstract: Called for each edge that does not result in a shorter path to its destination vertex.

Protocols/TreeSearchVisitor.html#/s:13Pe.abstract: Called for each edge that discovers a new vertex.
